SELECT DANCE.DANCE_NO ,DANCE.DANCE_TITLE,DANCE.DANCE_CONTENT,MEMBER.NICKNAME,DANCE.DANCEREALFNAME,DANCE.DANCEFNAME,DANCE.DANCEREALPATH,DANCE.DANCE_REGDATE,DANCE_CNT FROM DANCE_BOARD DANCE INNER JOIN MEMBER_BOARD MEMBER ON DANCE.MEMBER_SEQ=MEMBER.MEMBER_SEQ WHERE DANCE_NO=#{dance_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE DANCE_BOARD SET DANCE_CNT=DANCE_CNT+1 WHERE DANCE_NO=#{dance_no}
mapper.select: SELECT DANCE_NO, DANCE_TITLE, NICKNAME, DANCE_REGDATE, DANCE_CNT FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY DANCE_NO DESC) AS NUM, DANCE_NO, DANCE_TITLE, NICKNAME, DANCE_REGDATE, DANCE_CNT FROM DANCE_BOARD DANCE INNER JOIN MEMBER_BOARD MEMBER ON DANCE.MEMBER_SEQ=MEMBER.MEMBER_SEQ) WHERE NUM >= #{startWrite} AND NUM < #{endWrite} ORDER BY NUM
